name: ST Prototype
description:
The first (really rough) prototype for a 2D shooter i'm working on, wall jumping, wall climbing shooting and regular jumping all working.

Test level doesn't currently have an end but has enemies to kill and multiple weapons to try.

CONTROLS:

A/D to move Left/Right

W/S to move Up/Down when attached to walls

Space to Jump/Double Jump

Left Mouse to Shoot

Mouse Wheel up/down to change weapons

I'm looking for feedback on the feel of the movement mainly and maybe any changes you would make.
